name: Word Connect
description:
-- Lost Relic Game Jam 2022 Submission --

Theme : Connection

WORD CONNECT

This is a simple word game with the focus on connecting the letters of 2 words to form a chain.

Instruction: 

1.  Enter a 5 Letter word that begins with the last letter of the previous word to perform a word chain.

2. Points are awarded for each letter complexity similar to Scrabble.

3. Only Scrabble words are permitted.

4. Same word cannot be repeated.

Controls

Designed for ANDROID, however you can also use KEYBOARD and MOUSE to play.
